<xen:submitunit> <input type="submit" name="reload" value="{xen:phrase arcade_save_game}" class="button primary" id="saveReloadButton" data-ajaxvalue="{xen:if '!{$game.game_id}', '{xen:phrase continue}', '{xen:phrase save_all_changes}'}" /> <xen:if is="{$game.game_id}"> <input type="submit" name="saveexit" value="{xen:phrase save_and_exit}" class="button" id="saveExitButton" /> <input type="button" name="delete" value="{xen:phrase arcade_delete_game}..." accesskey="d" class="button OverlayTrigger" data-href="{xen:adminlink arcade/delete-game, $game}" id="deleteButton" {xen:if '!{$game.game_id}', 'style="display: none"'} /> </xen:if> </xen:submitunit>
<input id="gameId" type="hidden" name="game_id" value="{$game.game_id}" /> </xen:form>

listener.description: Adds the champion seal if enabled.

option.default_value: Arcade system is currently undergoing maintenance.
Your score has just been beat. So go back and try again for that champion status.

phrases.phrase:
*** PLEASE READ ***
You are adding a new game. Adding a new game manually is a two-step process. After you are done entering the information on this page and click the "Save All Changes" button below you will then be prompted for additional information about the game. That is where you will upload the .swf file and other files if needed. It is a two-step process because the additional information needed for the game will be different based upon the game System type.
Select a category for the game. If you need to create or edit the category names, click on the "Categories" link in the sidebar menu.
The requested category could not be found.
Category title must be unique. A category has already existed with the specified title.
Enter a description for the game.
Each game must be in a category.
Each game must be in a system.
With normal games, the higher score the better. With reversed scoring games, the lower score the better.
The requested game could not be found.
This will be resized automatically to use in various places.

Select an image to replace current one:
{image}
Games may contain more than one category, so you may see the same game show up across different categories.
Champion and highscores are ONLY available for games with leaderboard enabled.
Omit Chinese games from filter result.
No games found. Try to broaden your filter criteria.
Please queue games by selecting the check box to import into the system. You can queue multiple games to import at once.
Filter games by recommendation point (on the scale of 1..5).
Please be considerate before importing Mature games.
This game is featured by Mochi staff.
Enter the instructions on how to play the game.
There is no game to display.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following category:
Please confirm that you want to delete the following game:
Please upload a valid game package file. The file should have the extension of "zip" or "tar".

This is the unique identifier for game. This is normally the name of the game's flash .swf without the extension. For example, if the .swf file is named "buster.swf" then "buster" is the Slug value. NOTE: THIS VALUE IS CASE SENSITIVE! Your scores will not be saved if the Slug value is incorrect.
Game Slug must be unique. The specified slug is already in use.
The specified system could not be found: {system_id}
Viewing games in an Arcade category

IPB v3 & IPV v32 games typically have additional files that are needed for the game to fully functional. These additional files are normally located in a folder named "gamedata" within the game's download file. Browse your local PC and locate the "gamedata" folder for the game you are adding. Depending upon the exact type of game there may be several files such as "{slug}.xml" & "{slug}.txt" where {slug} matches the Slug value entered above. For v32 games there will also be a file named "v32game.txt" in the same folder. Upload all of the files except for "index.htm" if there is one present. The file "index.htm" is not need for the operations of the game. These additional files are stored in the XF database.
Select the game's arcade type. If you are adding a v3 Arcade game select the "Core" option. If you are adding an IPB game select the "IPB" option.

Browse your local PC and locate the flash (.swf) for the game you are adding. There is typically only one .swf file per game named "{slug}.swf" where {slug} matches the Slug value entered above. This file is saved as a physical file on your server.
Enter the name of the game.
Powerful multi-format arcade system by the XF Arcade team.
Automatically add a link to the NavBar?
Displays a champion seal in forum posts.
This message will be displayed when the arcade is disabled.
Disable this option to hide the game categories system from users - best used for small arcades.
Enter the path relative to your forum root of an image to use for champion seals. If this is left blank, the phrase arcade_champion_of_x will be used instead.
Your registered and verified publisher ID for MochiMedia.
Enter the message for the PM that will be sent to the previous champion when their highscore is beaten. BBCode is supported.
Enter the title for the PM that will be sent to the previous champion when their highscore is beaten.
Select the way in which active games should be displayed.
